Trent Cole finished second in the league in total defeats, defined as the total number of plays by a defensive player that prevents the offense from gaining first-down yardage on third or fourth down, stops the offense behind the line of scrimmage or results in a turnover. Trent Cole had 26 defeats, second to only Justin Tuck . Jason Babin finished third. And Quintin Mikell finished third among safeties with nine run defeats. Facebook group pleading for Sue to join the' X Factor' panel- and Jane Lynch agrees her character would make a "fantastic" judge, though she would probably clash with Simon Cowell . She said: People have asked me, "What about having Sue on` The X Factor'? How would she do?' I think she'd be fantastic- and there would be a few contestants reduced to tears. "It can never happen, though. Simon Cowell and Sue on the same judging panel will never work in a million years- there"s only room for one ego on the show!( c) BANG
